text: Yeah.  That is where I expected it, but it isn't there for me
Glad to hear it resolved itself :slightly_smiling_face:

i figured out the issue.  we have two brand domains i wanted to change just the upload location for one of the two so when i select the specific domain, that option disappears :disappointed: Is there a workaround?

If I am understanding you properly, this configuration works for your HubSpot account. So setting the default domain is a portal wide setting.
You can always choose to share a file on a different domain from your <https://app.HubSpot.com/files/5281758|Files tool>.

yeah that makes sense, i just dont see the marketer going to the file manager first and uploading the image then going back to the page editor and adding the image.  not the biggest issue in the world, but all of the other assets appear to load with the correct domain, feel like this should just automatically be under the brand domain
